summary: Adds a new room under the College of Winterhold for fast magicka regen.
descriptionHtml:
[img]https://image.ibb.co/euHfio/Untitled_1.png[/img]
Delve into the underground spring of magikaÂ and absorb the life force of the College. While standing in the mana pool, your magika regenerates by 200 every 2 seconds. This is useful for training spells such as illusion and alteration.
author: Eduard-GaluTech
